mapper.insert: insert into circleforfriends (user_id, content, imgUrls, releaseTime) values (#{user.id}, #{content}, #{imgUrls}, #{releaseTime})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, content, imgUrls, releaseTime from circleforfriends

select cs.id, cs.user_id, cs.content, cs.imgUrls, cs.releaseTime, u.id u_id,u.nickName u_nickName,u.headImgUrl u_headImgUrl,u.coverImgUrl u_coverImgUrl from circleforfriends cs JOIN user u ON cs.user_id=u.id
AND u.id=#{userId}
